plugin.name: Gephi Callgraph Exporter
plugin.description: Exports the current binary's call graph to a GEXF file for visualization in Gephi
plugin.longdescription: This plugin allows you to export the call graph of a binary to a GEXF file, which can be imported into Gephi for advanced graph visualization and analysis. The exported graph includes function names, addresses, sizes, and instruction counts as node attributes.
